code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[input,setInput]=useState("");const[theme,setTheme]=useState("light");const calculateResult=input=>{try{const operators=["+","-","*","/"];let operator=null;for(let i=0;i<input.length;i++){if(operators.includes(input[i])){operator=input[i];break;}}if(!operator){setInput(parseFloat(input).toString());return;}const[operand1,operand2]=input.split(operator).map(parseFloat);let
